mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT `menu`.`id`, `menu`.`parent_id`, `menu`.`name`, `menu`.`type`, `menu`.`uri`, `menu`.`remark`, `menu`.`disabled`, `menu`.`sort`, `menu`.`created_at`, `menu`.`updated_at`, `icon`.`id` `iconId`, `icon`.`class_name`, `icon`.`uri` AS `iconUri`, `icon`.`access_type` FROM `system_menu` `menu` LEFT JOIN `system_menu_icon` `icon` ON `icon`.`id` = menu.`icon_id` AND icon.`deleted` = 0
AND `menu`.`deleted` = 0 AND `menu`.`disabled` = 0
AND ( `menu`.`permission_id` IS NULL
OR `menu`.`permission_id` IN
#{id}
)
ORDER BY `menu`.`sort`
